Dialogue.Page: Mod: Nerves of Darkness Authors: Anonymous
Nerves of Darkness was a mod idea that Anonymous wanted to make after The Stranger They Are if they had time. It would take place in a star system orbiting a supermassive black hole.

The mod would have been centric around using sound as a means of communication and puzzle solving, as Echoes of the Eye did with vision. Signals, audio tapes, and other sound cues would have been involved.

The ultimate goal of the player would be to learn how to enter the black hole safely, and once they do, they will be able to explore a dark, unnerving structure at the singularity built by an exotic, photophobic new species...

But TSTA past both its August and September 2024 deadlines and Anonymous decided not to work on the mod, but instead leave behind a GitHub repository with concept art and a concept system made with New Horizons.
Perhaps one day this mod could be picked up and revived like Anonymous wanted, could that person be you?
